vulnerabilities.title: Decap CMS Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability
vulnerabilities.description: Decap CMS through 3.8.3 is vulnerable to stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) in the admin preview pane. User-controlled fields (e.g., title, description, tags, and body) are rendered in the preview without sufficient sanitization/escaping. An attacker with low-privilege author/contributor access can persist a JavaScript payload in content; when a maintainer or reviewer opens the preview, the payload executes in the CMS admin origin, enabling token/session theft or the execution of privileged actio
